subject: College Athletics
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: No. 1 Boston University did all the right things in the 57th annual Beanpot championship at TD Banknorth Garden to put away No. 3 Northeastern University, 5-2.
snippet: No. 1 Boston University did all the right things in the 57th annual Beanpot championship at TD Banknorth Garden to put away No. 3 Northeastern University, 5-2.
